abstract: MindJolt has just acquired two game companies, Social Gaming Network and Hallpass Media, effectively doubling its staff and adding mobile games to its stable of Web offerings.
snippet: MindJolt has just acquired two game companies, Social Gaming Network and Hallpass Media, effectively doubling its staff and adding mobile games to its stable of Web offerings.
lead_paragraph: Monica Almeida/The New York TimesChristopher T. DeWolfe, a co-founder of Myspace, has a new company, MindJolt.

headline.main: A Myspace Founder Builds Again, Buying Game Companies
